name: JöRD
description:
IKÖA wants to establish a new shipping route through the center of the earth, so they Swedens finest driller, Jorgen.

Help Jorgen maintain his drilling machine as he goes deeper into the earth, fill the reactor with fuel, reroute coolant to keep the engine and drill cool.

How deep can you go ?!

Created for the 48th Ludum Dare game jam  by:

  • Zpanzer (Art)
  • Thorlegs (Art)
  • Santino (Art)
  • PierreNS (Programming)
  • BonBonCul (Programming)
  • dipth (Programming)
  • Jesus2-0 (Programming)
